lyric.verse: Kono DOOR nara yaburenai Sono too nara kuzurenai Ano ten nara tsuburenai Dore mo usorashiku kaotte imasu
lyric.chorus: Tatoe maite mo sodatte mo KUREMACHISU Saite mo tsuyoku irotzukoo tomo Shunji ni damatte ochite yukimasu Dooshite? Naze ka nashikunatta no Genjitsu no yume
lyric.verse: Kono hai nara yaburenai Sono kao nara kuzurenai Ano ten nara kagirinai Dore mo akai iro ni niotte imasu
lyric.chorus: Kakute naite wa madotte wa narimasenu Tattara tsuyoku susumanakute wa Yatto de kokyuu ni natte kimashita Dooshite? Naze unasareteiru no Genjitsu ga yume Kyoo kara wa haete mo mebuite mo KUREMACHISU Saite mo yorokobi suginai kara Daiji na inochi hitotsu hitotsu dake Doo ka motte yukaremasenu yoo ni Naitari madottari itashimasenu tattara nidoto taorenai kara Nani mo iranai hitotsu hitotsu dake doo ka dare ka ia ENTRY NUMBER ONE
